about.me: Dyne (https://dyne.org/software-products).org is a non-profit free software foundry (https://dyne.org/software-products) with almost 20 years of expertise in developing applications used worldwide. Code is our literature: we build software (https://dyne.org/software-products) to communicate, interact and inspire. We let art, science and technology meet open source. (https://www.dyne.org/donate) We welcome donations and cooperation proposals for projects that benefit human society and respect the natural environment.
